languages.text: "Очень верное замечание. Да, я выступил их палачом и сожалею об этих потерях. Но не переоцениваю их значимость для Империума. Каждый день наша раса платит куда более страшную цену, и этому надо положить конец".

"Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."
languages.original_text: "Очень верное замечание. Да, я выступил их палачом и сожалею об этих потерях. Но не переоцениваю их значимость для Империума. Каждый день наша раса платит куда более страшную цену, и этому надо положить конец".

traits.locale_text: "Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."

"Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."

"Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."

"Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."

languages.text: 「ああ、その通りだとも。私は彼らの処刑人となった。その損失は残念なものだった。しかし、帝国にとって彼らの重要性を過大評価するなど愚の骨頂といえよう。日々、人類は恐ろしいほどの代償を払っている。そしてそれは終わらせねばならぬものだ」
languages.original_text: "Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、その通りだとも。私は彼らの処刑人となった。その損失は残念なものだった。しかし、帝国にとって彼らの重要性を過大評価するなど愚の骨頂といえよう。日々、人類は恐ろしいほどの代償を払っている。そしてそれは終わらせねばならぬものだ」

languages.text: “我明白你的意思了。没错，是我亲手杀害了那些人，而他们的损失也确实令人扼腕。不过，若是高估了那些人对帝国的重要性，那恐怕就太愚蠢了。人类每天付出的代价，都要比这可怕得多，这样的状况必须就此结束。”
languages.original_text: "Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."

traits.locale_text: “我明白你的意思了。没错，是我亲手杀害了那些人，而他们的损失也确实令人扼腕。不过，若是高估了那些人对帝国的重要性，那恐怕就太愚蠢了。人类每天付出的代价，都要比这可怕得多，这样的状况必须就此结束。”

languages.text: « Bien vu. Oui, je me suis fait leur bourreau, aussi regrettable qu'ait été leur disparition. Cependant, il aurait été fort imprudent de surestimer leur importance aux yeux de l'Imperium. Chaque jour, l'humanité paie un prix bien plus élevé et cela ne peut plus durer. »
languages.original_text: "Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."

traits.locale_text: « Bien vu. Oui, je me suis fait leur bourreau, aussi regrettable qu'ait été leur disparition. Cependant, il aurait été fort imprudent de surestimer leur importance aux yeux de l'Imperium. Chaque jour, l'humanité paie un prix bien plus élevé et cela ne peut plus durer. »

languages.text: «Tiene razón. Sí, actué como su verdugo y lamento las pérdidas. Sin embargo, sería un error sobrestimar su importancia para el Imperium. Cada día, la Humanidad paga un precio mucho mayor y es hora de ponerle fin».
languages.original_text: "Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón. Sí, actué como su verdugo y lamento las pérdidas. Sin embargo, sería un error sobrestimar su importancia para el Imperium. Cada día, la Humanidad paga un precio mucho mayor y es hora de ponerle fin».

languages.text: "Guter Punkt. Ja, ich war ihr Henker, so bedauerlich diese Verluste auch waren. Allerdings wäre es albern gewesen, ihre Bedeutung für das Imperium überzubewerten. An jedem einzelnen Tag bezahlt die Menschheit einen weit schlimmeren Preis, und das muss enden!"
languages.original_text: "Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."

traits.locale_text: "Guter Punkt. Ja, ich war ihr Henker, so bedauerlich diese Verluste auch waren. Allerdings wäre es albern gewesen, ihre Bedeutung für das Imperium überzubewerten. An jedem einzelnen Tag bezahlt die Menschheit einen weit schlimmeren Preis, und das muss enden!"

languages.text: "Anlıyorum. Evet, bu kayıplarla gurur duymasam da onların celladı oldum. Fakat onların İmparatorluk için önemini gözümde büyütmek aptallık olurdu. Her gün İnsanlık çok daha kötü bir bedel ödüyor ve artık bunun son bulması gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "Well noted. Yes, I acted as their executioner, as regrettable as those losses were. However, to overestimate their importance to the Imperium would have been folly. Every single day, Humanity pays a far more terrible price, and that must be brought to an end."
